sentences.en: A tamper resistant calibration plug seal provides protection from unauthorized personnel use.
sentences.cn: 防篡改刻度塞密封防止未经授权的个人用水.

sentences.en: Cabinet tamper and Siren tamper monitoring via System Inputs.
sentences.cn: 系统输入能监视电源、保险管及电池的状态.

sentences.en: Do not plug, remove, or tamper with any pressure relief device.
sentences.cn: 禁止拉拽 、 移动或堵塞任何减压装置.

sentences.en: Do not tamper with other's business.
I don't want to be accused of tampering with the evidence.
sentences.cn: 我不想被指控篡改证据。

sentences.en: If anyone tamper with this door it trip the alarm.
sentences.cn: 要是有人撬这扇门,就会触响警报器.

sentences.en: Is tamper - proof tape used to secure boxes or containers?
sentences.cn: 是否使用 防伪 胶带密封箱子和集装箱?

sentences.en: It should not overwhelm you with raw HTTP traffic dumps, and it goes far beyond simply providing a framework to tamper with the application by hand.
sentences.cn: 用户不会再被大量原始的HTTP流量数据淹没，而且这个工具远不仅仅是一个人工干预应用程序的框架。

sentences.en: NEVER tamper with pressure - relief devices in valves or cylinders.
sentences.cn: 禁止堵塞阀门或钢瓶的 减压装置.

sentences.en: Never tamper with safety devices in valves or cylinders.
sentences.cn: 禁止堵塞阀门或钢瓶的安全装置.

sentences.en: Please don't tamper with the clock radio.
sentences.cn: 请不要瞎弄那只收音机闹钟.

sentences.en: Students are absolutely forbidden to tamper with or equipmentfacility.
sentences.cn: 禁止学生在休息室以外的地方吃点心和喝饮料.

sentences.en: The machine will self - destruct if you tamper with it.
sentences.cn: 如果你折腾这台机器,它将会自毁.

sentences.en: Uses the streamline form outer edge , the tamper force with mercy.
sentences.cn: 采用流线型外框,刚柔并济.

sentences.en: Who are they to tamper with the rules of the game?
sentences.cn: 他们凭什么擅自修改比赛规则?

trans.tran_en: If someone tampers with something, they interfere with it or try to change it when they have no right to do so
